Title: Oppose hegemonism, uphold world peace - maintain a foreign policy of independence and own initiative
Publisher: Tianjin renmin meishu chubanshe (天津人民美术出版社)
Notes: The dove, top left, is from a 1950 lithograph by Pablo Picasso, used to illustrate the poster of the 1950 World Congress of the defenders of peace, held in London, and for the stage decoration of the The Asia and Pacific Rim Peace Conference in Beijing on October 2, 1952.
